name: Napsack
description:
Controls

Player 1
A/D Left/Right
Space - Jump
S - Duck
Q/Left Click - Attack / Respawn
W - Level Transition

Player 2
Left/Right Arrow - Left/Right

Enter - Jump
Down Arrow - Duck
Q/Left Click - Attack / Respawn
Up Arrow - Level Transition

Thanks for taking a look at Napsack, this is a hobby project that I'm currently considering putting more development effort in. If you have any feedback or suggestions I would love to hear them!

Art was beautifully crafted by RunninBlood
Purchased from https://runninblood.itch.io/asset-pack

Theme Music provided courtesy of
Giancarlo Castro

kastropolismusic@gmail.com

Time Line

0.0.0 - Scraps

0.0.1 - Playable demo

0.0.2 - Impliment BLue slimes

0.0.3 - Rise of the Red Slime

0.0.4 - Sprite updates - testing level length

0.0.5 - added random decoration generation
Cleaned tiles
Fixed character state engine freezing
Added hit sound effects
Added theme music provided courtesy of
Giancarlo Castro
stropolismusic@gmail.com

0.0.6 - Added local coop

Redid AI on all creatures to support coop and better path finding

0.0.8 -

0.0.9 - Advent of the Kobold

0.1.0 - 20 Levels

0.2.0 - Multiplayer? local/online maybe?

0.5.0 - 50 Levels

1.0.0 - 100 Levels - Challenges - Roguelite mode?
